summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 15, Ladd's Second Addition to South Seattle, being the alley between 11th Avenue South and 12th Avenue South from Snoqualmie Street to the southwesterly line of the City of Seattle Transmission Line right-of-way, and certain other alleys, avenues and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15597 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
